properties.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 19 at 11:16PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow
accumulations of 2 to 5 inches through the overnight, bringing
storm total snowfall amounts of 5 to locally 10 inches.

* WHERE...Cuyahoga county.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY
